__e: For the last time, I don't know where the damn camera stuff is.
Cos we've got fuckin' things to do, you prick, yeah?
You are so full of yourself, you can't see the fucking forest for the trees.
Now I can't even go home for a proper pinch 'cause I've lost my fucking keys.
All she does is bang on the damn keys!
I don't care for the way your company left me in fucking nowhere with keys to a fucking car that isn't fucking there.
And I don't wanna even know why your damn hands are stuck to your head.
I can't believe he puts his fucking hands on me, man. Fuck!
Because every time I try and talk to you, you're holding a little girl's bloody hand.
Unless that's the damn lights popping on again.
We're at a party with some of the hottest girls in the world... and we're staring at a bunch of fucking lights.
Well, whatever we get. Dude, we had no friggin' lights.
- Robert... - It makes me sick to my stomach to see... to see you teaching those damn kids when you're too afraid to have another child of your own!
Oh, I had to cut a deal with the damn kids.
Sleep like fucking children, don't ya, this is your world isn't it?
